@JamHoopFilm #7 starts in lake, hypnosis plot #8 On a boat. Stephen King's Pen. #9 most gory, uncut in Canada, body swapping, Kane Hodder
@JamHoopFilm #3 3D, finds mask #4 "Final Friday" Corey Feldman and Savini #5 Not Jason. Mental asylum. #6 "Jason Lives" ends in lake
@JamHoopFilm they're oft maligned but for me they're the pinnacle of 80s studio horror. & only franchise to successfully relocate to space.
@JamHoopFilm we watched #6 on the 13th. Campy fun.
